name: Obama Crush - iPhone compromise
description:
Hello! This is the version of Obama Crush for iPhones. It might not work on your device, but at least it will work on most iPhones. It is normal if the page warns that the game is not supported on your device, just press "ok". Refresh the page if it gets stuck.

The original page with the versions for computers, tablets, and Android is here.

Sound effects from Kummeli.

If you have any suggestions or the game doesn't work properly, feel free to leave a comment!
